video.title: SeaQuest DSV
video.synopsis: In the not-so-distant future, human civilization resides in the ocean's depths, confined to a peacekeeping vessel helmed by an unflappable commander.

episodes.synopsis: After reluctantly taking command of the SeaQuest, Capt. Nathan Bridger dispatches his crew to investigate a distress call coming from an underwater colony. But the so-called cry for help is actually a sinister trap. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: To Be or Not to Be: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After reluctantly taking command of the SeaQuest, Capt. Nathan Bridger dispatches his crew to investigate a distress call coming from an underwater colony. But the so-called cry for help is actually a sinister trap. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: To Be or Not to Be: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: It's a matter of life and death when Darwin falls ill and Capt. Bridger is forced to make a tough decision. Should the seaQuest crew abandon their exploration of an underwater forest filled with rare aquatic creatures to save one of their own?
episodes.title: The Devil's Window

episodes.synopsis: When the ancient libraries of Alexandria are unearthed on the ocean floor, Capt. Bridger and the rest of the seaQuest crew are dispatched to keep the peace between warring nations who want to lay claim to the priceless literary treasures.
episodes.title: Treasure of the Mind

episodes.synopsis: After pulling a warden and his sole prisoner from a frigid ice cap, the seaQuest crew falls victim to a shocking game of switcheroo. Suddenly, they find themselves taking orders from a renegade convict who wants to force them to fire on the UEO.
episodes.title: Games

episodes.synopsis: The seaQuest is overrun with greed when Krieg returns from a test dive clutching a gem that appears to be priceless. The crew is so obsessed with retrieving more riches that they ignore Krieg's stories about sea monsters lurking in the area.
episodes.title: Treasures of Tonga Trench

episodes.synopsis: After discovering an underground colony populated by children with no parents, Capt. Bridger and his crew move the youngsters to relative safety aboard the seaQuest. But one of them has no intention of leaving her home behind.
episodes.title: Brothers and Sisters

episodes.synopsis: It's a race against time as a rattled Capt. Bridger works to save Cmdr. Ford and the seaQuest crew from a life-threatening virus that appears to have originated from a sunken space station.
episodes.title: Give Me Liberte

episodes.synopsis: After exploring a crumbling ship that sank to the ocean floor ages ago, select crew members find themselves falling prey to a series of unexplainable events. Are their misfortunes merely coincidence, or are they caught in the ship's curse?
episodes.title: Knight of the Shadows

episodes.synopsis: When the seaQuest gets wind of a sightseeing submarine in distress, Capt. Bridger sends a rescue squad composed of Cmdr. Ford, Krieg, Lucas and Dr. Westphalen. But a deadly hurricane could blow their mission entirely off course.
episodes.title: Bad Water

episodes.synopsis: Krieg turns to a black-market supplier known as "The Regulator" when the seaQuest's air-conditioning system goes on the fritz. But it doesn't take long for the crew to realize that they're dealing with a dangerous man.
episodes.title: The Regulator

episodes.synopsis: In a story line straight out of the Wild West, Hitchcock follows a distress signal to an underwater mining town, where an innocent man and his family are being held hostage by a greedy outlaw and his bumbling henchmen.
episodes.title: SeaWest

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is forced to do a little soul-searching when he's asked to hack into the World Bank's computer system. If he follows through with the task, he'll gain the respect he's always craved aboard the seaQuest... but will he be able to respect himself?
episodes.title: Photon Bullet

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Bridger and the crew rush to recover a fallen space capsule with one of Bridger's friends on board after it crash-lands in the ocean following a mission to Mars. But the general of a militarized Asian federation is after the capsule too.
episodes.title: Better than Martians

episodes.synopsis: With only a skeleton crew in place, the seaQuest falls prey to an army of commandos who storm the vessel and take several members hostage. Now, with the clock running down, it's up to Cmdr. Ford to save the day.
episodes.title: Nothing But the Truth

episodes.synopsis: After gaining advanced knowledge of a devastating volcanic eruption from a top secret UEO file, Capt. Bridger and the seaQuest crew try to convince a group of treasure hunters to give up their search -- or die trying.
episodes.title: Greed for a Pirate's Dream

episodes.synopsis: The seaQuest reluctantly comes to the aid of illegal whaling ships when the crew learns that a vigilante submarine is randomly sinking them. While both activities are against the law, it's a question of siding with the lesser of two evils.
episodes.title: The Stinger

episodes.synopsis: William Shatner guest stars as a megalomaniacal Servo-Croat dictator who attempts to take over the seaQuest and harness its technology to help his autistic son. Along the way, he makes hostages of Dr. Westphalen and Dr. Lansdowne.
episodes.title: Hide and Seek

episodes.synopsis: While attending a conference, Lucas and several key members of the UEO are taken hostage by the traitorous Secretary Dre. Can the seaQuest crew locate the hostages before the secretary has them executed?
episodes.title: The Last Lap at Luxury

episodes.synopsis: At first, the seaQuest crew dismisses Cmdr. Ford's fantastic tales of a race of mermaid-like humans who can breathe unassisted in the ocean's depths. But when the commander goes missing, they're willing to believe almost anything.
episodes.title: Abalon

episodes.synopsis: Darwin the dolphin proves to be a valuable asset aboard the seaQuest when an underwater earthquake uncovers an alien spacecraft -- as well as an extraterrestrial who wants to communicate with the crew.
episodes.title: Such Great Patience

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Westphalen, Cmdr. Ford and Shan get caught under the thumb of a power-hungry dictator when they attempt to save a torpedoed refugee ship with Westphalen's daughter on board. Can Ortiz step in to save the day?
episodes.title: The Good Death

episodes.synopsis: With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, Capt. Bridger vows to sacrifice the seaQuest in order to shut down a power plant gone awry and keep the precious polar ice caps from melting.
episodes.title: Higher Power

episodes.synopsis: On a remote island, genetically engineered life forms known as Daggers stage a revolt against the military and gain control over powerful weapons. The seaQuest crew, which includes several new additions, responds to the problem.
episodes.title: Daggers: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Mariah, leader of the Daggers, takes control of a laser base, threatening to destroy the world's oxygen plants and suffocate the human race. The seaQuestcrew must prove to Mariah that the next generation of Daggers needs oxygen just like humans.
episodes.title: Daggers: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Searching for the origins of intelligent life, a group of aliens accept Bridger's invitation to board seaQuestand make their first contact with the human race. Gen. Thomas attempts to capture the aliens' advanced technology for military use.
episodes.title: The Fear That Follows

episodes.synopsis: When Bridger's old girlfriend sends out a distress signal from the underwater Miranda Colony, the seaQuestcrew discovers that the once-peaceful residents have gone completely insane and are trying to kill one another.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Deep

episodes.synopsis: While relaxing on the mainland, Piccolo gets word that his father needs help, so he enlists Lucas and Dagwood to assist him. When a scandal breaks out over Dr. Smith's possible relationship with Bridger, Smith considers transferring off the seaQuest.
episodes.title: Vapors

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious call from a child lures the seaQuestinto an underwater vortex, which sends the ship 250 years into the future. When they discover that almost all human life has been wiped out, the crew searches for a way to save the future of mankind.
episodes.title: Playtime

episodes.synopsis: When a computer-controlled submarine programmed with the personality traits of Capt. Bridger goes haywire and threatens to destroy New Cape Quest and its 5 million residents, Bridger must try to outmaneuver himself before everyone is killed.
episodes.title: The Sincerest Form of Flattery

episodes.synopsis: The seaQuestcrew investigates a distress call from an underwater horticultural colony, only to discover that all the residents are missing. The mystery deepens when one of the plants brought onto the ship from the colony mutates.
episodes.title: By Any Other Name

episodes.synopsis: After being held in cryogenic stasis for 22 years, a woman is released and immediately has her life threatened by an assassin. When Brody comes to the woman's rescue, he discovers that she's an important link to his past.
episodes.title: When We Dead Awaken

episodes.synopsis: Maintenance crew member Dagwood is given shore leave when the rest of the crew must undergo psychological evaluations. After Dagwood's genetic-engineer creator is murdered, an incriminating videotape surfaces showing Dagwood committing the crime.
episodes.title: Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: A strong underwater current drags a shuttle containing Henderson, Lucas, Brody and O'Neill into a labyrinth of ancient caves. With their vehicle damaged, the stranded crew members must find a new way to escape.
episodes.title: Dead End

episodes.synopsis: With the South Atlantic experiencing elevated temperatures due to undersea farming and mining, a gigantic prehistoric crocodile thaws out and begins terrorizing local farmers, including Ford's father and brother.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Cmdr. Ford proves that the mythological continent of Atlantis really did exist when he discovers ancient artifacts on a deep-sea diving mission. But celebrations are cut short when the curse of Atlantis strikes both Bridger and Ortiz.
episodes.title: Lostland

episodes.synopsis: After falling in love with the beautiful Sandra Kirby while on shore leave, Lucas resigns from his position as chief computer analyst. However, he soon finds himself at the mercy of cunning terrorists who are attempting to take over the seaQuest.
episodes.title: And Everything Nice

episodes.synopsis: NASA commander Scott Keller boards the seaQuest in order to study a comet that's about to land in the ocean. After the comet disintegrates, the crew discovers a hostile alien has boarded the ship and begun attacking people.
episodes.title: Dream Weaver

episodes.synopsis: With many of the world's political leaders mysteriously falling into comas, security across the globe begins to crumble. Wendy must employ her psychic abilities to battle Avatar, the powerful paranormal being who's responsible.
episodes.title: Alone

episodes.synopsis: While transporting a pop singer to a special concert at an island military base, Lucas and O'Neill stumble upon an ancient pyramid and witness a sighting of the Greek god Neptune. The crew must appease the god and prevent him from harming anyone.
episodes.title: Watergate

episodes.synopsis: When a group of researchers discover an ancient chest in an abandoned mining outpost in the Mediterranean, the seaQuest team arrives to provide protection. But once the chest is opened, an evil demon escapes and wreaks havoc.
episodes.title: Something in the Air

episodes.synopsis: With the help of the dangerous Mariah, a computer hacker known as "The Marauder" sets out to destroy the seaQuest. The two kidnap O'Neill, who was on a personal leave of absence from the ship, and use him as a bargaining chip against the crew.
episodes.title: Dagger Redux

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Smith learns that two crew members, Piccolo and Dagwood, experienced the same nightmare, she seeks help from her former boyfriend and parapsychology expert Clay Marshall, a man hiding his own dark secrets.
episodes.title: The Siamese Dream

episodes.synopsis: Piccolo survives a plane crash into the South American jungle, but he's soon taken prisoner by a terrible dictator who, unbeknownst to the rest of the world, has started producing artificial life forms.
episodes.title: Blindsided

episodes.synopsis: An alien spacecraft grabs hold of the seaQuest and transports it across the universe to the alien planet of Hyperion, where a war rages on between the KrayTaks and the Hyperion resistance, whom the crew decides to support.
episodes.title: Splashdown

episodes.synopsis: A decade after the seaQuest mysteriously vanished, the sub reappears. In the year 2032, the crew struggles to adjust to an increasingly dangerous world, Bridger's retirement and a tough new commander. Roy Scheider and Michael York guest star.
episodes.title: Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: On his first official job as commander of the seaQuest, Capt. Oliver Hudson must stop greedy businessman Larry Deon from flooding part of Saudi Arabia. Deon gains the upper hand by strategically placing civilians in harm's way.
episodes.title: In the Company of Ice and Profit

episodes.synopsis: The seaQuest crew is charged with unraveling a mystery when the United Earth Oceans Organization's hauling vessels begin disappearing in the Free Zone. During the mission, Capt. Hudson is reunited with a former flame.
episodes.title: Smoke on the Water

episodes.synopsis: Morally bankrupt businessman Larry Deon sets out to destroy a new underwater train on its maiden voyage. Lucas is charged with ensuring the train gets safely to its destination, and Ford and Henderson hop aboard for a secret date.
episodes.title: Destination Terminal

episodes.synopsis: Nuclear war looms on the horizon after power-hungry Adm. Vanalden fires missiles at an encampment in Macronesia. The UOE orders seaQuest's Capt. Hudson and his crew to take control of Vanalden's heavily fortified underwater base.
episodes.title: Chains of Command

episodes.synopsis: On a mission that leads Brody into a life-or-death situation, Capt. Hudson and the rest of the seaQuest crew set out to save Lt. Henderson from a death sentence decreed by her captor, President Bourne. Michael York guest stars.
episodes.title: SpinDrift

episodes.synopsis: As the seaQuest crew tries to stop a highly contagious virus from turning into a pandemic, Lucas is drawn into a confrontation with former commander Capt. Bridger over how to stop the pathogen from spreading. Roy Scheider guest stars.
episodes.title: Equilibrium

episodes.synopsis: When Max Scully returns, Hudson is charged with accompanying the extreme environmentalist to an underwater ecological paradise. But can Scully, who faked his own death twice, really be trusted? Jonathan Banks guest stars.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: Determined to get their hands on top secret information that could ruin their lives, Bridger and Ford head up a mission to retrieve data crystals from a UEO base that is now under Macronesian control. Roy Scheider guest stars.
episodes.title: Good Soldiers

episodes.synopsis: A mechanical malfunction sends the seaQuest back in time to 1962, where the crew gets caught in the middle of the Cuban missile crisis. As the clock ticks down, the seaQuest team attempts to prevent nuclear war. Brittany Murphy guest stars.
episodes.title: Second Chance

episodes.synopsis: When the UEO's charter comes up for renewal, corrupt businessman Larry Deon teams up with President Bourne to control the outcome. The duo's deadly plot involves turning Lt. Fredericks into an assassin. Michael York guest stars.
episodes.title: Brainlock

episodes.synopsis: During a stopover at a penal colony, Lt. Henderson learns her former lover is a prisoner there and unwittingly instigates a riot. Henderson's ex escapes with Larry Deon's partner, Mason Freeman, and the two desperados seize hostages.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: On their final voyage, the crew learns that O'Neill's cyber-friend is a defector of the Chaodai, a powerful Asian force with anti-sub weapons. Drawn into dangerous waters, the seaQuest crew unites in a life-or-death battle against the Chaodai.
episodes.title: Weapons of War
